DOC.criteria: Healthy adult gender ; Age 1885 year ; Elevated blood pressure identify : Systolic blood pressure 130mmHg high , diastolic blood pressure 90mmHg high ; Confirmed three separate occasion . Use Nattokinasecontaining supplement within 60 day prior enrollment ; Currently blood pressure medication ; History cancer chemotherapy within last 12 month ; Significant active uncontrolled disease ( lymphoma , cirrhosis , nephritis , uncompensated heart failure ) ; Consumption average 2 standard alcoholic drinks/day ( 14 drink per week ) Currently experience intense stressful events/ life change would negatively affect compliance ; Pregnant , nursing , try become pregnant ; Women use effective contraception ; Food allergy relate ingredient test product .
